General.Name: Luxxfolio Holdings Inc
General.Description: Luxxfolio Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated blockchain and digital asset company. It operates an industrial scale digital assets mining and hosting platform in the United States with a focus on the generation of digital assets. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1080 Mainland Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 2T4

1.Name: Mr. Geoffrey  McCord B.Com., C.A., C.P.A.
